imagingbook.pub.sift.scalespace

Class ScaleLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ij.process.ImageProcessor
      • ij.process.FloatProcessor
        • imagingbook.pub.sift.scalespace.ScaleLevel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class ScaleLevel
extends ij.process.FloatProcessor
    Represents a single scale level. Just a special kind of FloatProcessor with some extra fields and methods.
